text: "Taste" is a song by American singer Sabrina Carpenter from her sixth studio album, Short n' Sweet (2024). It was released on August 23, 2024, as the third single from the album. Carpenter wrote it with other songwriters. The song is about relationship issues. "Taste" is two minutes and 37 seconds long. It is a pop and slacker rock song. The song received good reviews from critics and was popular with her fans. ==References== Category:2024 songs Category:Sabrina Carpenter songs
title: Taste (Sabrina Carpenter song)
